```chart { "type": "multiple-line-chart", "title": "Compute vs Storage Usage (Jan–Jun 2025)", "description": "Line chart showing monthly trends for compute and storage resource usage (in petabytes and vCPU-hours).", "dataKey": "usage", "groupedKeys": ["Compute", "Storage"], "color": ["hsl(220, 75%, 50%)", "hsl(30, 85%, 55%)"], "legend": true, "data": [ { "month": "January", "Compute": 320, "Storage": 410 }, { "month": "February", "Compute": 340, "Storage": 395 }, { "month": "March", "Compute": 310, "Storage": 430 }, { "month": "April", "Compute": 360, "Storage": 415 }, { "month": "May", "Compute": 350, "Storage": 400 }, { "month": "June", "Compute": 370, "Storage": 420 } ] } ```
